headline.main: Small Amount of Bran Meets Most of Body's Fiber Needs

docs.lead_paragraph: Dried fruits, nuts, seeds, whole grains and cereals have always figured prominently in healthful diets, and

headline.main: Don't Call It a Fat Camp

byline.original: By JUDY KLEMESRUD Special to The New York Times

docs.abstract: Comment on Green Mountain Weight Control Community for Young Women in Poultney, Vt, which operates during summer mos and attempts to alter eating patterms for successful life-long weight control; camp dir Thelma J Wayler comments on techniques she employes in her concept, IDEA, insight, diet, educ and activity; camp's members participate in nutrition course, group interaction sessions and various sports; some members comment; illus (L)
docs.lead_paragraph: POULTNEY, Vt. It's not a fat camp. It's not a milk farm. It's not a beauty spa. It's a "weight control community," where women between the ages of 16 and 45 can spend their summer vacations and, they hope, take it off, take it all off.
docs.snippet: POULTNEY, Vt. It's not a fat camp. It's not a milk farm. It's not a beauty spa. It's a "weight control community," where women between the ages of 16 and 45 can spend their summer vacations and, they hope, take it off, take it all off.
